name: resolveCurrencyAmount(for:with:)
desc: Called when you need to resolve the currency amount to be transferred. DeprecatedUse resolveCurrencyAmount(for:with:) instead.
declaration:
optional func resolveCurrencyAmount(for intent: INSendPaymentIntent, 
                               with completion: @escaping (INCurrencyAmountResolutionResult) -> Void)
